n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x = [1, 2, 3]
n = 3

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(1, n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)
import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:

x.sort()

#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

def main(): 
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:
        
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__": 
    main()

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

# x = [1, 2, 3]
# n = 3

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)

    if n % 2 == 0:

    else:

if __name__ == "__main__":

    x.sort()
